summary: Nightly stress CI tests are failing consistently due to a server-side issue with the in-memory SQLite database, preventing reliable detection of performance regressions in the TypeScript SDK.
userImpact: CI pipeline cannot reliably detect performance regressions, reducing confidence in SDK release quality.
rootCause: Server-side issue specific to in-memory SQLite database
keyQuote: Nightly Stress CI have been failing consistently for the last two months. This appears to be due to a server-side issue (specific to in-memory sqlite database).
